message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LO, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.LG. 

The paper introduces a new action language for knowledge representation and reasoning, which is a core topic in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The language is designed to support modularization and structuring of knowledge, which are also important topics in logic (cs.LO) and programming languages (cs.PL). The paper also discusses the methodology of using the language, which involves the development, testing, and readability of a knowledge base, as well as the creation of knowledge representation libraries, which are relevant to software engineering (cs.SE) and machine learning (cs.LG).
